update.description:
All command line tools have been refactored into one unified tool: gz. This matches functionality of other tools, like hg and git.

The usage is now: `gz <command> [options]`, where <commands> are string like "topic", "log", "joint", etc.

A complete list of commands is available by using gz with no arguments.

Help on each command is available using gz help <command>

Tab completion is also in effect. You'll need to manually install this file using: `sudo cp tools/gazebo.bash-completion /etc/bash_completion.d/`. This file will be installed when installing from [debian](#!/osrf/gazebo-release/pull-request/12/support-to-install-bash-completion-script/diff).
update.title: New command line tool

content.raw:
gz_topic.cc is still using the deprecated gazebo api's:
~~~
tools/gz_topic.cc:326:16: warning: 'load' is deprecated [-Wdeprecated-declarations]
  if (!gazebo::load())
               ^
tools/gz_topic.cc:332:11: warning: 'run' is deprecated [-Wdeprecated-declarations]
  gazebo::run();
          ^
tools/gz_topic.cc:370:16: warning: 'init' is deprecated [-Wdeprecated-declarations]
  if (!gazebo::init())
               ^
tools/gz_topic.cc:378:11: warning: 'fini' is deprecated [-Wdeprecated-declarations]
  gazebo::fini();
          ^
~~~
content.html:
gz_topic.cc is still using the deprecated gazebo api's:

tools/gz_topic.cc:326:16: warning: 'load' is deprecated [-Wdeprecated-declarations]
  if (!gazebo::load())
               ^
tools/gz_topic.cc:332:11: warning: 'run' is deprecated [-Wdeprecated-declarations]
  gazebo::run();
          ^
tools/gz_topic.cc:370:16: warning: 'init' is deprecated [-Wdeprecated-declarations]
  if (!gazebo::init())
               ^
tools/gz_topic.cc:378:11: warning: 'fini' is deprecated [-Wdeprecated-declarations]
  gazebo::fini();
          ^

content.raw: There's still some changes in [branch gzmodify_scpeters_shasum](#!/osrf/gazebo/branches/compare/gzmodify_scpeters_shasum..gzmodify#diff) that uses shasum comparisons instead of the header file with super-size string constants (to prevent a reversion of #803). ~~I probably need to merge changes forward and test it again though.~~ I just merged in the latest changes to gzmodify.
content.html: There's still some changes in branch gzmodify_scpeters_shasum that uses shasum comparisons instead of the header file with super-size string constants (to prevent a reversion of #803). I probably need to merge changes forward and test it again though. I just merged in the latest changes to gzmodify.

content.raw: The waitForNamespaces function is being removed here, which prevents the pull request from building.
content.html: The waitForNamespaces function is being removed here, which prevents the pull request from building.

content.raw:
It seems that gazebo::transport::waitForNamespaces() method has been removed but there are a few places where the function is used. I got some errors trying to link with the transport library:


```
#!c++
../gazebo/transport/libgazebo_transport.so.3.0.0: undefined reference to `gazebo::transport::waitForNamespaces(gazebo::common::Time const&)'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
make[2]: *** [tools/gzfactory-3.0.0] Error 1
make[1]: *** [tools/CMakeFiles/gzfactory.dir/all] Error 2
make[1]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
../gazebo/transport/libgazebo_transport.so.3.0.0: undefined reference to `gazebo::transport::waitForNamespaces(gazebo::common::Time const&)'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
make[2]: *** [tools/gzstats-3.0.0] Error 1
make[1]: *** [tools/CMakeFiles/gzstats.dir/all] Error 2
../gazebo/transport/libgazebo_transport.so.3.0.0: undefined reference to `gazebo::transport::waitForNamespaces(gazebo::common::Time const&)'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
make[2]: *** [tools/gzlog-3.0.0] Error 1
make[1]: *** [tools/CMakeFiles/gzlog.dir/all] Error 2
CMakeFiles/gzserver.dir/Server.cc.o: In function `gazebo::Server::LoadImpl(boost::shared_ptr<sdf::Element>, std::string const&)':
/home/caguero/workspace/gazebo/gazebo/Server.cc:389: undefined reference to `gazebo::transport::waitForNamespaces(gazebo::common::Time const&)'
CMakeFiles/gzserver.dir/gazebo.cc.o: In function `gazebo::setupClient(int, char**)':
/home/caguero/workspace/gazebo/gazebo/gazebo.cc:211: undefined reference to `gazebo::transport::waitForNamespaces(gazebo::common::Time const&)'

```
content.html:
It seems that gazebo::transport::waitForNamespaces() method has been removed but there are a few places where the function is used. I got some errors trying to link with the transport library:

../gazebo/transport/libgazebo_transport.so.3.0.0: undefined reference to `gazebo::transport::waitForNamespaces(gazebo::common::Time const&)'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
make[2]: *** [tools/gzfactory-3.0.0] Error 1
make[1]: *** [tools/CMakeFiles/gzfactory.dir/all] Error 2
make[1]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
../gazebo/transport/libgazebo_transport.so.3.0.0: undefined reference to `gazebo::transport::waitForNamespaces(gazebo::common::Time const&)'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
make[2]: *** [tools/gzstats-3.0.0] Error 1
make[1]: *** [tools/CMakeFiles/gzstats.dir/all] Error 2
../gazebo/transport/libgazebo_transport.so.3.0.0: undefined reference to `gazebo::transport::waitForNamespaces(gazebo::common::Time const&)'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
make[2]: *** [tools/gzlog-3.0.0] Error 1
make[1]: *** [tools/CMakeFiles/gzlog.dir/all] Error 2
CMakeFiles/gzserver.dir/Server.cc.o: In function `gazebo::Server::LoadImpl(boost::shared_ptr<sdf::Element>, std::string const&)':
/home/caguero/workspace/gazebo/gazebo/Server.cc:389: undefined reference to `gazebo::transport::waitForNamespaces(gazebo::common::Time const&)'
CMakeFiles/gzserver.dir/gazebo.cc.o: In function `gazebo::setupClient(int, char**)':
/home/caguero/workspace/gazebo/gazebo/gazebo.cc:211: undefined reference to `gazebo::transport::waitForNamespaces(gazebo::common::Time const&)'

update.description:
All command line tools have been refactored into one unified tool: gz. This matches functionality of other tools, like hg and git.

The usage is now: `gz <command> [options]`, where <commands> are string like "topic", "log", "joint", etc.

A complete list of commands is available by using gz with no arguments.

Help on each command is available using gz help <command>

Tab completion is also in effect. You'll need to manually install this file using: `sudo cp tools/gazebo.bash-completion /etc/bash_completion.d/`. This file will be installed when installing from [debian](#!/osrf/gazebo-release/pull-request/12/support-to-install-bash-completion-script/diff).
update.title: New command line tool

content.raw: Is this a pause? It looks you want to run one iteration. Should we check if something in the world has changed after the iteration? Maybe the simulation time...
content.html: Is this a pause? It looks you want to run one iteration. Should we check if something in the world has changed after the iteration? Maybe the simulation time...
